title: Fed signals possible rate cut as inflation cools
summary: Policy makers noted easing inflation and potential rate cuts later this year.
content: Federal Reserve officials discussed a possible rate cut as inflation data cools and risk-off sentiment rises.

title: Geopolitical tensions lift gold demand
summary: Safe-haven flows push gold higher amid conflict concerns.
content: Investors turn to safe-haven assets as geopolitical conflict escalates, boosting gold prices.
